channel.description: Week 2 Announcements This Week Mon: Lab 1 Due 7 PM Fri: Week 2 Quizzes Next Mon: Lab 2 Next Mon: Week 2 Discussion Speaker: Seth Galitzer CS System Administrator since 2006 B.S. in Computer Science (K-State) Manages all CS Systems & Labs Lab 2 Redo Lab 1 using Puppet Reinstall OS, Install Puppet, Make Snapshot Write Puppet Manifest & Test Keep it Simple! Use puppet resource to query Solutions < 200 LOC Keep in Touch!
